She‚Äôs off the phone now & singing along to the radio.

@THATJacqueline Wow.
Now she‚Äôs on the phone with BoomBoom. This time it‚Äôs on speaker.
Next thing out of her mouth ‚Äúcall BoomBoom‚Äù
She just hung up the phone didn‚Äôt say hi or sorry. All she said in an annoyed tone was ‚Äúare you in labor?‚Äù I said ‚Äúnope.‚Äù

She‚Äôs talking about medical issues with a friend. Some of it is rather graphic. Which is tough for me to hear in my condition.
I get in the car & my driver is on the phone. Doesn‚Äôt even turn to smile or say hello. Just keeps on talking.
